data.name: Armored Sinner
data.detailed_description:
▼Story▼
There was a human kingdom. This kingdom was a prosperous one. When the kingdom fell, unsavory individuals rose to power.
That's not your main problem.
At the very least, you might face them while trying to escape the Jail, and by extension, this Kingdom.
Your current concern is escaping.

▼Game▼
- Standard RPGMaker gameplay.
- Relatively short.
- Control only one character with minimal friendly NPC interactions.
- Items from chests and corpses pave the way forward.
- Die & die repeatedly to increase your stats with an item you gain from dying. Or grind your levels the hard way.
- Discover an ending. Do it all over again. Change the order of events and discover the end of your journey.

data.short_description: A short story and short journey. You awaken in a strange jail with no other living humans around. You vaguely remember being convicted for an unknown sin you committed in the past. You will reach the end of the path and find out why you're here.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1/Win8/Win8.1/Win10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contain contents that might be considered mature content such as dead bodies, bloody textures and violent descriptions. This game might also contain horror themes.
